quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Iron Maiden and Song
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, pair, death. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Which song by Iron Maiden contains the following lyrics ...at 5 oclock they take me to the gallows pole, the sands of time for me are running low...?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Hallowed be Thy Name

questions.question: On which of the following Iron Maidens album covers does Eddie appear as a face in the clouds?

options.text: Seventh Son of a Seventh Son

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Brave New World

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT an album by Iron Maiden?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 2 Minutes to Midnight

questions.question: What was the lineup of Iron Maiden for their 2006 world tour (A matter of Life and Death)?

options.text: Nicko McBrain, Janick Gers, Steve Harris, Adrian Smith, Dave Murray, Bruce Dickinson
Nicko McBrain, Steve Harris, Bruce Dickinson, Dave Murray, Adrian Smith, Doug Sampson
Clive Burr, Janick Gers, Steve Harris, Bruce Dickinson, Dave Murray, Paul DiAnno
Bruce Dickinson, Nicko McBrain, Steve Harris, Adrian Smith, Dennis Stratton, Janick Gers

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Nicko McBrain, Janick Gers, Steve Harris, Adrian Smith, Dave Murray, Bruce Dickinson

questions.question: The song Only the Good  Die Young appears on which Iron Maiden album?

options.text: A Matter of Life and Death
Seventh Son of a Seventh Son

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Seventh Son of a Seventh Son

questions.question: Prior to 2007 Forest Whitaker portrayed mainly doctors in movies and television.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: Which of the following is a song by Iron Maiden?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Alexander the Great

questions.question: On which of Iron Maidens album covers does Eddie appear wearing a straight jacket?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Piece of Mind

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a song by Iron Maiden?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Philosopher

questions.question: What is the name of the prostitute character that features in several songs by Iron Maiden?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Charlotte

questions.question: On the Iron Maiden album Live after Death, the intro before the first song, Aces High, contains which of the following?

options.text: excerpt from a speech by Winston Churchill

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: excerpt from a speech by Winston Churchill

questions.question: ...Take my life but Ill take yours too, youll fire your musket but Ill run you through... are lyrics appearing in what song by Iron Maiden?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Trooper

questions.question: Forest Whitaker was a choice to play Sawyer on the television show Lost.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: In which pair of movies were Forest Whitakers characters shown in flashbacks?

options.text: The Crying Game and The Last King of Scotland
Jasons Lyric and The Crying Game

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jasons Lyric and The Crying Game

questions.question: In 1987 Forest Whitaker starred in two movies, one with Emilio Estevez as Jack Pismo and the other with Robin Williams as Edward Garlick. Name the movies. Which were these movies?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Stakeout and Good Morning Vietnam

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Kiefer Sutherland and Actor
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, title. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Kiefer Sutherland did not know his dad was an actor until the age of 18.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Which of the following is not a song from the Iron Maiden album Killers?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Children of the Damned

questions.question: Which of the following is  the title of a song by Iron Maiden?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Different World

questions.question: Does actor Kiefer Sutherland have any siblings?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Yes

questions.question: In what popular show did Kiefer Sutherland play an agent from the Counter Terrorist Unit?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 24

questions.question: Canadian actor Kiefer Sutherland was engaged to Angelina Jolie.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: Where was the majority of Iron Maidens album Live After Death recorded?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Long Beach, USA

questions.question: ...When Im walking a dark road, I am a man who walks alone...are lyrics from which of the following Iron Maiden songs?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Fear of the Dark

questions.question: Which of the following statements about the band Iron Maiden is true?

options.text: Paul DiAnno performs vocals on the original recording of Phantom of the Opera.
Bruce Dickinson performs vocals on the original recording of The Clansman.
Blaze Bayley performs vocals on the original recording of No Prayer for the Dying.
Bruce Dickinson performs vocals on the original recording of Man on the Edge.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Paul DiAnno performs vocals on the original recording of Phantom of the Opera.

questions.question: How many middle names does actor Kiefer Sutherland have?

questions.question: How tall is Canadian actor Kiefer Sutherland?

questions.question: Was actor Kiefer Sutherland arrested for driving while intoxicated in 2003?

questions.question: What was the name of actor Kiefer Sutherlands first wife?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Camelia Kath

questions.question: Actor Kiefer Sutherland is a keen tennis player.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: What character does actor Eddie Murphy voice in the computer-animated Shrek movies?

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: His boot

questions.question: What happens to Arnold Schwarzeneggers character in the 1994 movie Junior?

options.text: A plant starts growing out of his ear.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He gets pregnant.

questions.question: What funny tagline was used for the theatrical poster of the 1988 comedy movie Twins?

options.text: Only their mother can tell them apart.
Youve never seen two people so identical.
Seriously, these guys here are twins.
No, you are not seeing double. Arnold Schwarzenegger and Danny DeVito are twins.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Only their mother can tell them apart.

questions.question: How did actress Caryn Elaine Johnson, better known as Whoopi Goldberg, get her interesting stage name?

options.text: Her mother gave her this name.
It was the name of her favorite cat.
She used the sound whoopi a lot as a child.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: From a raspberry cushion

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: We Are Ready

questions.question: In interviews in 1999 and 2001 actor Ben Stiller confessed he was suffering from this disorder, and in 2006 he said he was joking back then.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Bipolar disorder

questions.question: Robin Williams passion for a certain sport resulted in his massive collection of these objects.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Bicycles

questions.question: What famous painting did Rowan Atkinsons character Mr. Bean ruin in his 1997 Bean: The Ultimate Disaster Movie?

options.text: Anatomy Lesson of Dr. Nicolaes Tulp

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Whistlers Mother

questions.question: What character did Arnold Schwarzenegger play in the 1997 movie Batman  Robin?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mr. Freeze

questions.question: After comedian Steve Martin was elected for the student counsel at Garden Grove High School Comedian, he reportedly made a giant banner shaped like this object that stated Thank you for your support.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Milkman

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: John Matrix

questions.question: What funny character did actress Ellen DeGeneres voice in the 2003 animated movie Finding Nemo?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dory

questions.question: After several jobs, which firm did billionaire Mark Cuban start?

questions.question: What singer and actress starred alongside Arnold Schwarzenegger in the 1996 movie Eraser?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Vanessa Williams

questions.question: In 1995, Mark Cuban started AudioNet with his friend Todd Wagner. How did this company make money?

options.text: It broadcast music videos over the Internet.
It was an online technical support company.
It broadcast live sports events over the Internet.
It broadcast live musical events over the Internet.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: It broadcast live sports events over the Internet.

questions.question: Billionaire Mark Cuban is largely responsible for the development of this firm, founded in 1974 by theater owner Gary Meyer.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Landmark Theaters

questions.question: What is the nickname of Arnold Schwarzeneggers character in the 1987 movie Predator?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dutch

questions.question: What is the name of the wheel which Conan is forced to push in the 1982 movie Conan the Barbarian?

questions.question: In the 1994 movie True Lies, Arnold Schwarzeneggers character lies to his family that this is his real job.

questions.question: Where was American billionaire Mark Cuban born?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Pennsylvania

questions.question: As a 12-year-old Mark Cuban sold garbage bags.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Which NBA team was bought by American billionaire Mark Cuban in 2000?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dallas Mavericks

questions.question: Billionaire Mark Cuban and Todd Wagner sold their company Broadcast.com for 5.4 billion dollars. Who did they sell it to?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Yahoo

questions.question: Mark Cuban is an advocate of whose philosophy?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ayn Rands

options.text: The Man in the Gray Flannel Suit

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Snows of Kilimanjaro and The Macomber Affair

options.text: the conflict between Edward R. Murrow and U.S. Senator Joseph McCarthy
